name: automation-challenge
description: This project is part of the Senior Automation challenge to automate some test cases of OrangeHRM.

scripts.run-all-specs: npm run pretest && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/specs/*'
scripts.run-api: npm run pretest && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/specs/marvel-api/*'
scripts.run-e2e: npm run pretest && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/specs/marvel-orange-hrm-e2e/*'

author: Winston Cruz
